mapper.select: select h.DATA_TYPE,h.DATA_COUNT,h.IRSL_DATE,h.DATA_DATE from (select t.*, row_number() over(PARTITION BY data_type order by Data_date desc) as rn from sjpt_realtime_STATIC_month t where t.irsl_date=#{month} and data_type=#{type} and Data_date like #{day}||'%' ) h where h.rn = 1

select t.DATA_TYPE,t.DATA_COUNT,t.IRSL_DATE,t.DATA_DATE from (select DATA_TYPE,DATA_COUNT,IRSL_DATE,DATA_DATE, row_number() over(partition by irsl_date order by DATA_DATE desc ) as rn from sjpt_realtime_STATIC_month where data_type= #{type} and irsl_date >= to_char(add_months(to_date(irsl_date,'yyyymm'), -12),'yyyymm') ) t where t.rn=1 order by irsl_date

select t.DATA_TYPE,t.DATA_COUNT,t.IRSL_DATE,t.DATA_DATE from (select DATA_TYPE,DATA_COUNT,IRSL_DATE,DATA_DATE, row_number() over(partition by irsl_date order by DATA_DATE desc ) as rn from sjpt_realtime_STATIC_month where data_type= #{type} and irsl_date like #{year}||'%' and irsl_date <= #{month} ) t where t.rn=1 order by irsl_date

select w.DATA_TYPE,w.DATA_COUNT,w.IRSL_DATE,w.DATA_DATE from sjpt_realtime_STATIC_month w join ( select t.DATA_DATE from ( select r.*, row_number() over( order by DATA_DATE desc) as rn from sjpt_realtime_STATIC_month r where data_type=#{type} ) t where t.rn=1 ) q on w.DATA_DATE=q.DATA_DATE where w.data_type=#{type} order by w.data_type

select w.DATA_TYPE,w.DATA_COUNT,w.IRSL_DATE,w.DATA_DATE from sjpt_realtime_STATIC_month w join ( select t.DATA_DATE from ( select r.*, row_number() over( partition by irsl_date order by DATA_DATE desc) as rn from sjpt_realtime_STATIC_month r where data_type=#{type} ) t where t.rn=1 ) q on w.DATA_DATE=q.DATA_DATE where w.data_type=#{type} order by w.data_type
